name: Santaban
description:
Ok, so Santa's temp elf apparently messed up delivering lots of presents properly. Now Santa has to travel to 50 different locations in the world to shove them where they initially were supposed to end up.

Controls:

In the menu screen use the [Cursor] keys to navigate and [Return] to select.
[Esc] quits when in a submenu.

Ingame use the [Cursor] keys to move Santa and to shove the presents around.
[R] resets the level if you get stuck
[P] pauses/unpauses the game
[H] highlights/dehighlights walkable tiles
[Esc] quits to menu screen

[F11] switches between fullscreen and windowed mode.

Enjoy & Happy Holidays!

Padman :)
